about_the_game:
A Redemption Story

Will, gifted with the Spark, returns to his hometown to reconnect with those he left behind and find himself. Once a proift boxer, Will ran away after a tragic event in the ring that shattered not only his life but the lives of others in town. Some want revenge, others see a way to use him for their own gains.

Switching Worlds

With the Spark, Will doesn’t just see the world like a Viking or Aztec; he interacts with it in completely different ways. Where brute strength isn’t enough for Will, the Viking easily dominates. Where Will can’t sneak through, the Aztec can. Switching between them helps Will uncover city secrets, solve ancient puzzles, and, when battle strikes, he can rely on the Viking’s might or the Aztec’s agility.

Combat as a Puzzle

Will faces different enemies in the present and deadly clans in the Viking and Aztec worlds. The Spark lets him tackle combat as a puzzle: Will uses his boxing skills for intense one-on-one fights, the Viking smashes crowds with his hammer, and the Aztec strikes with deadly accuracy using his boomerang. Each encounter requires using all the characters' skills, but some foes are so powerf

Different Perspectives

From graffiti-covered streets and crime-ridden alleys in Will’s hometown to the snow-capped Viking mountains and the mystical Aztec catacombs. These worlds are more than reflections of reality: each has its own history, characters, conflicts, and mysteries. Only by following the Viking and Aztec can Will learn the truth about himself. But there's always a risk — he may lose himself in the visions and never return.

Environmental Interaction

The battle arenas in each hero’s world allow the player to interact with their surroundings differently. In the Viking’s world, you can throw or push objects, while in the Aztec’s world, you can use height or distance to your advantage. Combining the environment’s features gives you the upper hand in combat.

Exploration and Puzzles

Follow Will’s journey as he investigates the mystery of the Spark, diving into Viking and Aztec flashbacks to solve local puzzles and unlock new abilities for each character. Master their skills and discover the best combinations for progressing through the game.

name: Tenet of the Spark

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350 or Intel Core i5-3470 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R7 250 or GeForce GT 640 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-9590 or Intel Core i7-6700K or equivalent
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or Radeon R9 390X or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Tenet of the Spark is a narrative action game where boxer Will discovers the powers of a mighty Viking and nimble Aztec to fight a criminal city and save those he cares about. Strengthen your connection to your ancestors, unlock new abilities and learn all the mysteries of the Spark.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America*, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Belarusian, Georgian, Serbian, Polish
*languages with full audio support
